nodes.bodyText: I think we should keep this, maybe rarely(), or else we'll never test any of the code paths for multi-chunk files.

SearchableSnapshotsIntegTests uses a fs repository with a chunk_size setting:

  
    
      elasticsearch/x-pack/plugin/searchable-snapshots/src/test/java/org/elasticsearch/xpack/searchablesnapshots/SearchableSnapshotsIntegTests.java
    
    
         Line 84
      in
      9507065
    
    
    
    

        
          
           .setSettings(Settings.builder().put("location", repo).put("chunk_size", randomIntBetween(100, 1000), ByteSizeUnit.BYTES)) 
        
    
  


I think it's better to have it there and not in this QA test, what do you think?
